channel.title: Multi-lingual on Jesse's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Multi-lingual on Jesse's Blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Creating this site and putting it on IPFS TLDR: If your like me and learn from reading code over guides. Here is the repo https://github.com/derage/derage.github.io. You can checkout how to deploy it here I present to you a partially distributed website running on IPFS and using cloudflare to cache the website and DNS. If you are using a brave browser or chrome with the IPFS extension installed, you can go to ipfs://QmaQymof8voW1HNPAK4FCJWxbopL94aBpD34qR696n5CEJ.
